org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class DownloadThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.AbstractThread
        • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.DownloadThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class DownloadThread
extends AbstractThread
    This thread asynchronously downloads thumbs from XBMC and returns them as Bitmap. When downloaded, the thumb is automatically saved to the memory- and disk- cache for further usage.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

    • Method Detail

      • getCover

        public void getCover(DataResponse<Bitmap> response,
            ICoverArt cover,
            int thumbSize,
            INotifiableController controller,
            INotifiableManager manager,
            Context context)
        Asynchronously downloads a thumb from XBMC and stores it locally.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        cover - Which cover to download
        thumbSize - Which size to return

      • download

        public static boolean download(DataResponse<Bitmap> response,
               ICoverArt cover,
               int thumbSize,
               INotifiableController controller,
               INotifiableManager manager,
               Context context,
               boolean addToMemCache)
        Synchonously downloads a thumb from XBMC and stores it locally.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object, can be null.
        cover - Cover to download
        thumbSize - Size to return to response object
        controller - Controller to be announced, can be null.
        manager - Manager is needed to obtain different managers for cache access
        context - Context is needed for obtaining other manager instances
        Returns:
        True if cover was downloaded successfully, false otherwise.

        public static DownloadThread get()
        Returns an instance of this thread. Spawns if necessary.

      • quit

        public static void quit()
